item.title: How do i add the command ::Kill (username) and it kills em?
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

I’ve got a command on my server called ::eat, but I will recode it for you, so that it will only work for admins +.

if (command.startsWith("kill") && playerRights >= 2) { String nam = command.substring(4); client victim = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(nam)]; victim.ApplyDead(); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = " "+nam+" has been killed by " + playerName + " "; setAnimation(829); }

item.title: How do i add the command ::Kill (username) and it kills em?
item.dc:creator: @hulkman68 hulkman68
item.description:
@hulkman68 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:304734”][code]
if (command.startsWith(“kill”)) {
String name = command.substring(5);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)

            client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
            c.applyDead;
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll(name + " has been killed");
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
        }
    }

[/code][/quote]erm dude where do i put this!!!(please reply)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add the command ::Kill (username) and it kills em?

item.title: How do i add the command ::Kill (username) and it kills em?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

if (command.startsWith("kill")) {
String name = command.substring(5);
            try {
                int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name);
                client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
                c.applyDead;
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll(name + " has been killed");
            } catch (Exception e) {
                sM(name + " either isn't online or doesn't exist");
            }
        }

Read full topic
